languages.text: "Да, ты понимаешь правильно. Каждая нить, связывающая людей, каждая жизнь — бесценны. Нет награды больше, чем вести других к спасению, когда вокруг — темнота".

traits.locale_text: "Сервиторы в прошлом были людьми. Все выглядело так, будто ритуал сервиторизации прошел неверно, и их души страдают. Я хотел{mf||а} подарить им покой".

languages.text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."
languages.original_text: "Да, ты понимаешь правильно. Каждая нить, связывающая людей, каждая жизнь — бесценны. Нет награды больше, чем вести других к спасению, когда вокруг — темнота".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

"Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people together, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

"Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

"Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

"Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

"Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

languages.text: « Oui, vous avez parfaitement compris. Chacun des fils qui relient les gens entre eux, chaque vie, a une valeur au-delà de tout entendement. Il n'est pas de plus belle récompense que de guider les autres vers le salut quand tout ce qui nous entoure n'est plus que ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, vous avez parfaitement compris. Chacun des fils qui relient les gens entre eux, chaque vie, a une valeur au-delà de tout entendement. Il n'est pas de plus belle récompense que de guider les autres vers le salut quand tout ce qui nous entoure n'est plus que ténèbres. »

languages.text: “是的，你的理解很正确。每条连接人们的线，每个生命，它们的价值都是无法估量的。当我们身处黑暗时，引领别人获得救赎本身就是最大的奖赏。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

traits.locale_text: “是的，你的理解很正确。每条连接人们的线，每个生命，它们的价值都是无法估量的。当我们身处黑暗时，引领别人获得救赎本身就是最大的奖赏。”

languages.text: "Ja, das habt Ihr richtig verstanden. Jeder Faden, der Menschen verbindet, jedes Leben — ihr Wert ist nicht zu bemessen. Es gibt keine größere Belohnung, als andere zur Erlösung zu führen, wenn wir nur von Dunkelheit umgeben sind."
languages.original_text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, das habt Ihr richtig verstanden. Jeder Faden, der Menschen verbindet, jedes Leben — ihr Wert ist nicht zu bemessen. Es gibt keine größere Belohnung, als andere zur Erlösung zu führen, wenn wir nur von Dunkelheit umgeben sind."

languages.text: «Sí, así es. Todo lo que une a la gente y todas las vidas tienen un valor incalculable. No hay mejor recompensa que guiar a otros por el camino de la salvación cuando no hay más que oscuridad alrededor».
languages.original_text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, así es. Todo lo que une a la gente y todas las vidas tienen un valor incalculable. No hay mejor recompensa que guiar a otros por el camino de la salvación cuando no hay más que oscuridad alrededor».

languages.text: 「ああ、その理解で正しい。人と人を繋ぐすべての糸、すべての命… その価値は計り知れない。周囲は闇に覆われている状況において、人を救いへと導くことほど大きな報酬はない」
languages.original_text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、その理解で正しい。人と人を繋ぐすべての糸、すべての命… その価値は計り知れない。周囲は闇に覆われている状況において、人を救いへと導くことほど大きな報酬はない」

languages.text: "Evet, doğru anlıyorsun. İnsanları, her hayatı birbirine bağlayan ipliklere paha biçilemez. Bizi çevreleyen tek şey karanlıkken başkalarını kurtuluşa erdirmekten daha büyük bir mükâfat olamaz."
languages.original_text: "Yes, you do understand correctly. Every thread that connects people, every life — their value is beyond measure. There is no greater reward than guiding others to salvation when all that surrounds us is darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, doğru anlıyorsun. İnsanları, her hayatı birbirine bağlayan ipliklere paha biçilemez. Bizi çevreleyen tek şey karanlıkken başkalarını kurtuluşa erdirmekten daha büyük bir mükâfat olamaz."
